create.ref_help: The workzone number is the journal number that you received from the Faculty Secretariat in the email together with your letter of acceptance in regard to processing personal data. If you do not have a workzone number please contact the Faculty Secretariat for guidance.

invite_user.ref_help: The workzone number is the journal number that you received from the Faculty Secretariat in the email together with your letter of acceptance in regard to sharing personal data. If you do not have a workzone number please contact the Faculty Secretariat for guidance.

invite_user.ref_text: I confirm that I am familiar and comply with the EU GDPR and UCPH internal procedures in regard to transfer and disclosure of personal data.
invite_user.ref_help: To share sensitive data with anyone you need to be aware of and in compliance with both internal and external rules and regulations. Please refer to the details in UCPH rules for sharing personal data before you share this project with anyone.

create.ref_help: The workzone number is the journal number given by the Tech Trans Office in connection with entering the agreement. If you do not have a workzone number please contact the Tech Transfer Office for guidance.

invite_user.ref_text: I confirm that I comply with the signed agreement and am familiar with UCPH internal procedures in regard to disclosure of sensitive data.
invite_user.ref_help: To share sensitive data with anyone you need to be aware of and in compliance with both internal and external rules and regulations. Please refer to the details in UCPH rules for sharing data subject to an agreement before you share this project with anyone.
